content: GX-IE Gas-actuated insulation nailer Gas nailer for insulation fastening on soft and some tough concrete and cold formed steel studs (insulation board thickness 25-150 mm| 1 – 5 7/8) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and easy fastening method for insulation applications – up to five times quicker than conventional methods Short and comfortable stroke (20 mm │ 3/4) with low recoil, reducing fatigue, especially in overhead applications Cordless tool platform – the same battery for all 12V Hilti tools Excellent battery reach – 5,000 nails per charge, with a charging time of just 30 minutes Excellent gas can reach – more than 800 shots per gas can Applications One system that fastens mineral wool, EPS, XPS, PIR, and PUR to soft and some tough concrete and cold formed steel stud Suitable for fastening insulation material to wall and ceiling. Suitable for fastening insulation material in Light-ventilated Façade application (LVF) Suitable for fastening insulation material to the bottom of concrete slab (ceiling) Fastening basement perimeter wall insulation (foundation wall) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Fastener Intake: Single Fastener length range: 0.98 - 5.91 in Power source type: GC 52 Gas can Technical Data | Fastener Intake | Single | Fastener length range | 0.98 - 5.91 in | Power source type | GC 52 Gas can | Power (max.) | 100 J ### ITEMS- 3721643 - GX IE + X-IE-GS 2” (6400)+GC52(8) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x GX-IE 01 Gas-actuated tool - 1x GX 2-IE Case - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 6400x Insulation fastener X-IE-GS 2 - 8x Gas can GC 52 for GX 2 - 2x Battery pack B 12-30 Li-ion - 3603904 - Tool and fasteners for EPS, XPS, PUR insulation boards and mineral wool - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x GX-IE 01 Gas-actuated tool - 1x GX 2-IE Case - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 3200x Insulation fastener X-IE-G 6-50 - 4x Gas can GC 52 for GX 2 - 2x Battery pack B 12-30 Li-ion - 3721380 - GX IE + X-IE-GS 3” (3200)+GC52(4) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x GX-IE 01 Gas-actuated tool - 1x GX 2-IE Case - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 3200x X-IE-GS 4 Insulation fastener - 4x Gas can GC 52 for GX 2 - 2x Battery pack B 12-30 Li-ion -
